Source.Name: claws-mail-plugins
Source.Description: Claws Mail, Additional plugins for claws-mail

Package.Summary: ACPI notification plugin for claws-mail

Package.Summary: Never forget a typed address in Claws Mail

Package.Summary: Archiving features for Claws Mail

Package.Summary: claws-mail-plugins-archive için geliştirme dosyaları

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-att-remover
Package.Summary: Attachments remover plugin for Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-attachwarner
Package.Summary: Attachment warner plugin for Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-bsfilter
Package.Summary: Bayesian spam filtering for Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-clamd
Package.Summary: Use Clam AntiVirus to scan messages in Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-fancy
Package.Summary: Display HTML emails in Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-fetchinfo
Package.Summary: Modify headers of downloaded messages in Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-gtkhtml2-viewer
Package.Summary: GTK Html Viewer for Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-mailmbox
Package.Summary: Add support for mailboxes in mbox format to Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-newmail
Package.Summary: Make Claws Mail write a message header summary to a file

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-notification
Package.Summary: Various ways to notify about new messages in Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-notification-devel
Package.Summary: claws-mail-plugins-notification için geliştirme dosyaları

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-pdf-viewer
Package.Summary: Enables the viewing of PDF and PostScript attachments

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-perl
Package.Summary: Perl based extended filtering engine for Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-python
Package.Summary: Python scripting access to Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-rssyl
Package.Summary: RSS plugin for Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-spam-report
Package.Summary: Report spam mail to various places with Claws Mail

Package.Name: claws-mail-plugins-tnef
Package.Summary: TNEF message parsing for Claws Mail

Package.Summary: TNEF message parsing for Claws Mail
